entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
